entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
